channel.title: Change the information for first starter package
channel.description:
Hello guys, i'm trying to change the information that appears when my players will get they're first starter package, which is one of two on they're ip address.
I'm fine with the rules and all, but in the chatbox it shows welcome to my base
i need to change that, any ideas as to where that would be?
revision: [PI]
here's a picture
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/1199d2e.jpg[/img]

item.title: Change the information for first starter package
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Z File Searcher works well if you are just trying to search a string of text throughout multiple files in a directory.

I would try PlayerAssistant first and then go from there.

Read full topic
item.source: Change the information for first starter package

item.title: Change the information for first starter package

item.description:
@blazkiller123 wrote:

so i get the eclipse thing.

but then it’s like
UHHHHHHHHHHHHHh, wdf?

so yeah any idea on how to get the program to do this string search he was talking about?

xD,

item.source: Change the information for first starter package

item.title: Change the information for first starter package
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

It really depends on the base you’ve used.

Check the client/config classes first though.

Nonetheless if you’re serious about this project I highly recommend downloading and taking full use of a program that’s capable of a recursive file search (Eclispe is my preferred) as it can search all files for your specified string… Which will inevitably save you precious time.

Read full topic
item.source: Change the information for first starter package
